entry.title: Zelensky Calls for Justice Over Alleged Russian War Crimes
entry.content: Ukraine’s president described Russian forces as “murderers” and “rapists” as the extent of killings in towns surrounding Kyiv began to emerge, vowing to prosecute what he called war crimes.

entry.title: Ukrainian Refugees Mostly Are Finding Shelter in Private Homes
entry.content: An informal network of support comprising Western Europeans and Ukrainians in diaspora has taken in refugee families and has eased the burden on public services, but officials are wary of a backlash as the war drags on.
